name: Michael Masters*
role: Human mutation scientist[Non-game 1](pre-War)Follower of Roy Phillips

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Bastards. Could have done it the easy way and just let us live here with them. Oh well. Guess we better get started with the clean up.{scoffing at the massacre}

topics.topic_text: I hear you're the person to see about buying stuff for my suite.
topics.response_text: They got you living up there?

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me what the items do?
topics.response_text: Well, you wanna be more specific or do I have to guess?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your Themes.
topics.response_text: Themes, huh? What's the matter... too lazy to decorate yourself?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to change my house's Theme.
topics.response_text: Jeez... make up your mind, will ya?

topics.topic_text: Okay, let me take a look at your stuff.
topics.response_text: Now we're talkin'.

topics.topic_text: Enough about the suite. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the My First Infirmary.
topics.response_text: If you went and did something stupid, like busting up a limb or something, this setup will allow you to heal just like being at a Wasteland Doctor.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Jukebox.
topics.response_text: This noise box will fill your room with awful human-made music. How can you stand listening to that garbage anyway?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the My First Laboratory.
topics.response_text: If you like blowing yourself up by mixing chemicals and trying to make drugs to get you higher than the top of this tower, this addon's for you.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Nuka-Cola Machine.
topics.response_text: Well let's see. It's a machine, and it gives you Ice Cold Nuka-Colas. What are you, stupid?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Workbench.
topics.response_text: Find one of them fancy schematics? Well, you can use this table to build whatever it is in your own place.

topics.topic_text: That's enough about the items.
topics.response_text: Yeah, okay.

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Vault Theme.
topics.response_text: Awww... do we miss our old home?{Sadly mocking}

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Raider Theme.
topics.response_text: Into the blood and guts look? Reminds me of my old home.{coy}

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Wasteland Explorer Theme.
topics.response_text: Well, if you have to feel like your out in the Wasteland, I guess this is for you. Me, I like to stay out of the sun.{coy}

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Science Theme.
topics.response_text: Sounds great, Poindexter.

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Pre-War Theme.
topics.response_text: Still want to live in the past, huh? Well, forget it. Those days are long gone.{coy}

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in the Love Machine Theme.
topics.response_text: Yuck, the thought of walking around naked's making me sick.{coy}

topics.topic_text: Let me ask about something else.
topics.response_text: Fine.

topics.topic_text: Actually, let me pick another Theme.
topics.response_text: Agh... make up your mind already!

topics.topic_text: Sounds good to me.
topics.response_text: Finally! Let's get down to business.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade.
topics.response_text: Well, this stuff is mostly crap. But whatever. Oh, and I found some weapons and armor, so I'll be trading in that. It's more useful anyway.{grumbling but excited to try out his new role as merchant}

topics.topic: MS12FinMurderedTopicWhere are the other Tenpenny Tower residents?
topics.topic_text: What happened to the other Tenpenny Tower residents?
topics.response_text: Heh. Roy decided to take out the trash. I'm glad I lost my sense of smell. You'll want to stay clear of the basement storage room.{ironically amused that a bunch of people were slaughtered}

topics.topic_text: What's it like living at Tenpenny Tower?
topics.response_text: It's weird actually. I used to vacation here before the bombs dropped. Used to be a resort for the wealthy and powerful.{ironic}

topics.topic_text: So what are you doing in the Metro tunnels?
topics.response_text: I've been stomping around with Roy and his gang of misfits. Roy's a no nonsense, take no prisoners kinda guy.{grumpy}

topics.topic_text: Gustavo hired me to kill you.
topics.response_text: Figures. He's Tenpenny's adorable lapdog, isn't he? So what's your angle in all this?{suspicious}

topics.topic_text: Relax. It's just a warning, not a threat. I'm not going to kill you.
topics.response_text: That's awfully decent of you, even if we already knew those bigoted bastards wanted us dead. Talk to Roy Phillips. You might be able to help us out.{a bit shocked someone would be kind to them}

topics.topic_text: Anything you want to say before you meet your maker?
topics.response_text: Karma's a fucking bitch, isn't she?{fatalistic and about to die}

topics.topic_text: I don't have to kill you. If you were to give me a handful of caps...
topics.response_text: Open your eyes, kid. Does it look like I got a fortune? Now bugger off before I get angry.{annoyed he's being extorted}

topics.topic_text: So tell me, what's it like being a Ghoul?
topics.response_text: I wasn't always like this. I was a goddamn scientist. We were doing great things. Amazing things.{grumpy man retelling his glory days}

topics.topic_text: I can handle myself.
topics.response_text: It's your own funeral then. Just remember that when you die, you die alone. Then you just rot until some jackal comes and snacks on you.{a grumpy man dismissing a jerk}

topics.topic_text: Just passing through.
topics.response_text: Just passing through? That's no way to live your life. You need a purpose. A goal.{a grumpy man schooling a kid}

topics.topic_text: Whatever.
topics.response_text: Apathy is the death of the soul. It's better to be angry as hell! It keeps things interesting anyway.{grumpy man schooling a loser how to get passionate through anger}

topics.topic_text: I'm here to see Roy Phillips.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah? Is he expecting you? Well then, run along. It's not wise to keep Roy waiting. Has a bit of temper that one. You watch yourself.{suspicious and giving warning}

conversation.response_text: You there! Put your weapons away, and come over here. No funny business unless you want to get shot.{SHOUTING a warning at a person approaching in the distance}

description:
Michael Masters is a 110 year-old Ghoul Male.

A pre-War electronic and biological engineer who became a ghoul after the Great War. Michael is bitter about his transformation yet acknowledges the scientific progress made through his unethical human mutation experiments. He retains his human eye color, a rare trait among ghouls.

Michael Masters's Personality: Bitter and resentful about his ghoulification, yet intellectually proud of his past scientific achievements. Pragmatic and manipulative, he appears outwardly hostile but is actually working with Roy Phillips. Values knowledge and progress but lacks empathy for those who suffered in his experiments.

Michael Masters's Backstory: Prior to the Great War, Michael Masters was a renowned electronic and biological engineer fascinated by human mutation. Inspired by international research, he conducted unethical experiments to create super-soldiers for the American military. He acknowledges the harm caused but remains proud of the scientific progress. When the bombs fell on October 23rd, 2077, Michael was in his laboratory and was exposed to significant radiation, ghoulifying him. He views this transformation as 'karmic punishment' for his experiments. Before the war, he occasionally vacationed at Tenpenny Tower, finding dark irony in his current situation where he must fight his way into the place he once visited for leisure.
